law.text: An insurer that offers a limited health service benefit plan that utilizes a provider network shall have a provider network that is available to all persons enrolled in the plan within thirty (30) minutes or thirty (30) miles of each enrollee's place of residence or work, to the extent available.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2002.
